title: Bug 25419[Dialogs] Can't Maximize Window: "Preferences"
OB: Build: 200210181211The "Preferences" window cannot be maximized since it neither has a maximizetitle bar button nor does the title bar respond to being doubleclicked.The only work around is to reside the window manually by dragging the border.For shortlived windows this is too detailoriented and timeconsuming.
